profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.1.2 File header - PDF header
profile.description: The % character of the file header shall occur at byte offset 0 of the file. The first line of a PDF file is a header identifying the version of the PDF specification to which the file conforms
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The % character of the file header shall occur at byte offset 0 of the file. The first line of a PDF file is a header identifying the version of the PDF specification to which the file conforms

error.message: File header does not start at byte offset 0 or does not correctly identify the version of the PDF document
